alert.note: Alert for Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:14PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Fork Crow River at Delano affecting Hennepin and Wright Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Crow River at Delano. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding occurs on 90th St SE and approaches County Rd 17 by 20.5 ft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 930 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 19.9 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.0 feet on 04/15/2001. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
